Send predefined notifications to test the system
Sends a notification only to your current browser/device. Uses the NotificationService directly.
Sends a notification via GraphQL to the server, which broadcasts it to ALL connected clients via WebSocket.
Tauri apps use native OS notifications. Web/PWA uses browser notifications via Service Worker.
This project is designed to rapidly spin up Angular applications within a monorepo with minimal configuration…

days ago.description: Relative time: Days ago (e.g., ’3 days ago’)

hours ago.description: Relative time: Hours ago (e.g., ’2 hours ago’)

in days.description: Relative time: Days from now (e.g., ’in 3 days’)

in hours.description: Relative time: Hours from now (e.g., ’in 2 hours’)

in minutes.description: Relative time: Minutes from now (e.g., ’in 5 minutes’)

in months.description: Relative time: Months from now (e.g., ’in 3 months’)

in weeks.description: Relative time: Weeks from now (e.g., ’in 2 weeks’)

in years.description: Relative time: Years from now (e.g., ’in 2 years’)

Just now.description: Relative time: Less than 1 minute ago

minutes ago.description: Relative time: Minutes ago (e.g., ’5 minutes ago’)

Momentarily.description: Relative time: Less than 1 minute from now

months ago.description: Relative time: Months ago (e.g., ’3 months ago’)

weeks ago.description: Relative time: Weeks ago (e.g., ’2 weeks ago’)

years ago.description: Relative time: Years ago (e.g., ’2 years ago’)

This is a minor update and requires restart
